text: And establish prayer and give zakat and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience]
Charity is only for the poor and the needy...
And those who hoard gold and silver...
O you who have believed...
And give its due [zakah] on the day of its harvest
Take, [O Muhammad], from their wealth a charity...
And whatever you give for zakat...
And those within whose wealth is a known right...
And establish prayer and give zakat...
And they were not commanded except to worship Allah...
Islam is built upon five pillars: ...
No owner of gold or silver...
On silver, the zakat is a quarter of a tenth...
On what is watered by rain and springs...
There is no charity due on less than five camels...
For every forty sheep, one sheep is due...
Allah has made zakat obligatory on their wealth...
reference: Bukhari - Hadith of Mu'adh ibn Jabal

text: Charity does not decrease wealth...
reference: Muslim - Book of Righteousness and Relations

text: Protect yourselves from the Fire even with half a date...
Allah is Good and accepts only that which is good...
Whoever pays the zakat on his wealth, its evil has left him
Zakat is the bridge of Islam
Every day two angels descend...
Whoever pays the zakat on his wealth willingly...
Protect your wealth with zakat, treat your sick with charity...
